snippet: Metro-North Railroad, the nation's second-largest commuter rail system, on Wednesday released a final report on what it has done to improve safety following a series of accidents last year and said it has completed most of its priorities....

headline.print_headline: Metro-North Railroad: Most Safety Steps Completed
headline.main: Metro-North Railroad: Most Safety Steps Completed

lead_paragraph: Metro-North Railroad, the nation's second-largest commuter rail system, on Wednesday released a final report on what it has done to improve safety following a series of accidents last year and said it has completed most of its priorities.
